thread.title: Banned in the UK: straws and cotton buds, maybe

title: Banned in the UK: straws and cotton buds, maybe
text:
Banned in the UK: straws and cotton buds, maybe Thursday, April 19, 2018 - 00:57 
Britain plans to ban the sale of plastic straws and other single use products and is pressing Commonwealth allies to also take action to tackle marine waste, the office of Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May said.   
Britain plans to ban the sale of plastic straws and other single use products and is pressing Commonwealth allies to also take action to tackle marine waste, the office of Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May said.  //reut.rs/2HLnapb
